Description:
Marketing Manager (Trade Marketing) - JeddahResponsible in the management and development of marketing activities through effective communication, marketing campaigns and promotional events by ensuring to maintain the branding image of the company.Manage the objectives and KPIs laid down by the line manager.
Manage the development and implementation of marketing activities according to the plans laid down by the management
Manage spending budgets and ensure maximum ROI is generated and no over spending is done.
Monitor competition activities and recommendation of appropriate responses.
Improving brand presence with developing/updating the fitting POSM and campaign execution across trade through excellence in in-store planning, execution and tracking in alignment with the annual marketing priorities.
Leading activation programs with partners to improve brand visibility
Visiting the points of sales regularly to ensure that the brand is visible, and guidelines are respected.
Supervise/lead the field marketing team across regions while ensuring a proper operation plan including quarterly evaluation and career development path.
Analysing the success of marketing campaigns and creating reports.
Plan a yearly event calendar and ensure the best presence.
Develop and execute the new channels marketing plan.
Report all marketing efforts monthly.
Control the assigned budget and update quarterly.
Assist the management on devising a marketing/ business plan on an annual basis.
Working closely with agencies and suppliers to ensure business continuity in terms of promotional/ marketing campaigns and general administration.
Working closely with the team in fulfilling internal customer requirements.
Communicate the campaign & product details to Management, Sales Team, and Operations Teams.
Communicate Campaign brief & present proposals for the agency & management for the campaign creative layouts and channels selection and schedule.
Discussion on the legal terms & conditions which are required for the campaign promotions & events with the legal Advisor's team.
Works safely at all times, observe all quality and housekeeping policies and keeps own work station clean and hygienic
Ensuring 100% compliance with both the local and international partners for effective results.
Any other related tasks put by the managementSkills
Skills:
Business Development DNA and commercial minded
Strong sense of need for achievement of goals and success
High level of motivation, determination and commitment.
Sound ability and knowledge to develop standards of operations and strategic processes
Ability to work under own initiative in a highly pressured environment
Capacity to read situation, understand environments and respond accordingly
Capable of prioritizing between revenue generating actions and time consuming tasks with low yield impact
Mentality of customer service and taking responsibility beyond direct duties

+5 years of experience within brand management ideally from the Lubricants/Tires/Battyeries.
